price: Господару наш, отклони патњу од нас, ми ћемо, сигурно, да верујемо!“
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
